publication_info.publication_description:
"Introducing the powerful and versatile 2008 Chevrolet Colorado LT Automatic - the ultimate pickup truck for any task. With its smooth and efficient automatic transmission, this truck offers a comfortable and effortless driving experience. The LT trim level boasts an impressive range of features, including a spacious and well-equipped interior, a reliable V6 engine, and advanced safety technology. Perfect for work or play, the Colorado has a rugged exterior design and a capable towing capacity, making it the top choice for any adventure.

Located in Miami, Florida, Cars & Co Corp offers NO CREDIT CHECK BUY HERE PAY HERE FINANCING, making it hassle-free to stay within your budget. Our customer-friendly sales team handles everything in-house, from sales to service, and we also buy cars for cash and welcome trade-ins. With thousands of auction vehicles available, all with warranties and ready for immediate delivery, you can trust us to provide the best deal for your money.

This 2008 Chevrolet Colorado LT is priced at just $2,299.00 USD, a discounted cash price for cash purchase only. It must be paid in full at the time of purchase and does not include government fees, taxes, or dealer fees. But don't worry, if you're not satisfied with your purchase, we offer a full credit of the purchase price towards an exchange for another vehicle on our lot within the first three (3) days of purchase (subject to the car being in the same condition as of the date of sale).

Don't miss out on the opportunity to own this reliable and versatile truck. With a branded title, visit our dealership for details. And for added convenience, you can send a message via this Facebook Marketplace listing instead of calling. Don't wait, motivate your drive and get behind the wheel of this impressive 2008 Chevrolet Colorado LT today!" See less
